00058     template< class IdTraits, class Cmp=std::less<typename IdTraits::id_type> >
00059     struct id_cmp {
00060       Cmp m_cmp;
00061     public:
00062       typedef typename IdTraits::base_type base_type;
00063       typedef typename IdTraits::id_type  id_type;
00064 
00069       id_cmp(Cmp const &cmp)
00070        :m_cmp(cmp) {}
00071       
00082       bool operator()(base_type const &a, base_type const &b) const {
00083        return m_cmp(IdTraits::get_id(a), IdTraits::get_id(b));
00084       }
00095       bool operator()(id_type const &a, base_type const &b) const {
00096        return m_cmp(a, IdTraits::get_id(b));
00097       }
00108       bool operator()(base_type const &a, id_type const &b) const {
00109        return m_cmp(IdTraits::get_id(a), b);
00110       }
00111     }; // TREX::utils::id_cmp<>
00112 
00124     template<class IdTraits, class Ty>
00125     struct map_id_traits {
00126       typedef std::pair<typename IdTraits::base_type, Ty>     base_type;
00127       typedef typename IdTraits::id_type                      id_type;
00128       typedef typename boost::call_traits<id_type>::param_type return_type;
00129       
00136       static return_type get_id(base_type const &p) {
00137        return IdTraits::get_id(p.first);
00138       }
00139     }; // TREX::utils::map_id_traits<>
00140 
00153     template<class IdTraits, class Ptr=typename IdTraits::base_type *>
00154     struct pointer_id_traits {
00155       typedef Ptr                         base_type;
00156       typedef typename boost::call_traits<base_type>::param_type argument_type;
00157       typedef typename IdTraits::id_type  id_type;
00158       typedef typename boost::call_traits<id_type>::param_type return_type;
00159 
00166       static return_type get_id(argument_type ptr) {
00167        return IdTraits::get_id(*ptr);
00168       }       
00169     }; // TREX::utils::pointer_id_traits<>

00227     template<class IdTraits, class Cmp=std::less<typename IdTraits::id_type> >
00228     class id_mapper {
00233       id_cmp<IdTraits, Cmp> m_cmp;
00234 
00235     public:
00236       typedef typename IdTraits::base_type                     base_type;
00241       typedef typename IdTraits::id_type                       id_type;
00247       typedef typename boost::call_traits<id_type>::param_type reference;
00248       
00256       id_mapper(Cmp const &cmp = Cmp())
00257        :m_cmp(cmp) {}
00259       ~id_mapper() {}
00260 
00261 
00277       template<class Iter>
00278       bool before(Iter x, reference id) const {
00279        return m_cmp(*x, id);
00280       }
00296       template<class Iter>
00297       bool after(Iter x, reference id) const {
00298        return m_cmp(id, *x);
00299       }
00300 
00319       template<class Iter>
00320       Iter lower_bound(Iter from, Iter to, reference id) const {
00321        for( ; to!=from && before(from, id); ++from);
00322        
00323        return from;
00324       }
00325 
00344       template<class Iter>
00345       Iter upper_bound(Iter from , Iter to, reference id) const {
00346        for( ; to!=from && !after(from, id); ++from);
00347        
00348        return from;
00349       }
00350     }; // TREX::utils::id_mapper
00351 
00370     template< class IdTraits, class Cmp=std::less<typename IdTraits::id_type> >
00371     class list_set {
00372     public:
00377       typedef typename IdTraits::base_type value_type;
00382       typedef typename IdTraits::id_type   key_type;
00383 
00384     private: 
00396       typedef std::list<value_type> container_type;
00397 
00398       container_type           m_list;   
00399       id_mapper<IdTraits, Cmp> m_mapper; 
00400     public:
00401       typedef typename container_type::size_type       size_type;
00402       typedef typename container_type::difference_type difference_type;
00403       typedef typename container_type::iterator        iterator; 
00404       typedef typename container_type::const_iterator const_iterator; 
00405 
00410       list_set() {}
00417       list_set(list_set const &other) 
00418        :m_list(other.m_list) {}
00430       template<class Iter>
00431       list_set(Iter from, Iter to) {
00432        for( ; to!=from; ++from) 
00433          insert(*from);
00434       }
00436       ~list_set() {}
00437 
00443       bool empty() const {
00444        return m_list.empty();
00445       }
00446 
00451       size_type size() const {
00452        return m_list.size();
00453       }
00454 
00463       iterator begin() {
00464        return m_list.begin();
00465       }
00474       iterator end() {
00475        return m_list.end();
00476       }
00485       const_iterator begin() const {
00486        return m_list.begin();
00487       }
00496       const_iterator end() const {
00497        return m_list.end();
00498       }
00499 
00515       iterator lower_bound(key_type const &k) {
00516        return m_mapper.lower_bound(begin(), end(), k);
00517       }
00518       const_iterator lower_bound(key_type const &k) const {
00519        return m_mapper.lower_bound(begin(), end(), k);
00520       }
00538       iterator lower_bound(value_type const &v) {
00539        return lower_bound(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00540       }
00541       const_iterator lower_bound(value_type const &v) const { 
00542        return lower_bound(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00543       }
00561       iterator upper_bound(key_type const &k) {
00562        return m_mapper.upper_bound(begin(), end(), k);
00563       }
00564       const_iterator upper_bound(key_type const &k) const {
00565        return m_mapper.upper_bound(begin(), end(), k);
00566       }
00585       iterator upper_bound(value_type const &v) {
00586        return upper_bound(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00587       }
00588       const_iterator upper_bound(value_type const &v) const {
00589        return upper_bound(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00590       }
00612       std::pair<iterator, iterator> equal_range(key_type const &k) {
00613        iterator end_p = end(),
00614          pos = m_mapper.lower_bound(begin(), end_p, k);
00615        return std::make_pair(pos, m_mapper.upper_bound(pos, end_p, k));
00616       }       
00617       std::pair<const_iterator, const_iterator> equal_range(key_type const &k) const {
00618        const_iterator end_p = end(),
00619          pos = m_mapper.lower_bound(begin(), end_p, k);
00620        return std::make_pair(pos, m_mapper.upper_bound(pos, end_p, k));
00621       }
00644       std::pair<iterator, iterator> equal_range(value_type const &v) {
00645        return equal_range(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00646       }       
00647       std::pair<const_iterator, const_iterator> equal_range(value_type const &v) const {
00648        return equal_range(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00649       }
00667       std::pair<iterator, bool> insert(value_type const &v) {
00668        iterator from, to;
00669        bool inserted = false;
00670 
00671        boost::tie(from, to) = equal_range(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00672        if( from==to ) {
00673          from = m_list.insert(from, v);
00674          inserted = true;
00675        }
00676        return std::make_pair(from, inserted);
00677       }
00678       
00693       iterator find(key_type const &k) {
00694        iterator from, to;
00695        
00696        boost::tie(from, to) = equal_range(k);
00697        if( from==to ) 
00698          return end();
00699        return from;
00700       }
00701       const_iterator find(key_type const &k) const {
00702        const_iterator from, to;
00703        
00704        boost::tie(from, to) = equal_range(k);
00705        if( from==to ) 
00706          return end();
00707        return from;
00708       }
00725       iterator find(value_type const &v) {
00726        return find(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00727       }
00728       const_iterator find(value_type const &v) const {
00729        return find(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00730       }
00741       iterator erase(iterator pos) {
00742        return m_list.erase(pos);
00743       }
00753       iterator erase(iterator from, iterator to) {
00754        return m_list.erase(from, to);
00755       }
00765       iterator erase(key_type const &k) {
00766        iterator from, to;
00767        
00768        boost::tie(from ,to) = equal_range(k);
00769        return erase(from, to);
00770       }
00771 
00776       void clear() {
00777        m_list.clear();
00778       }
00779 
00780       value_type const &front() const {
00781        return m_list.front();
00782       }
00783       value_type &front() {
00784        return m_list.front();
00785       }
00786       void pop_front() {
00787        m_list.pop_front();
00788       }
00789       
00790     }; // TREX::utils::list_set
